name: drunken
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A drunken person is (often) under the influence of alcohol: She was convicted of murdering her drunken and allegedly violent husband. The square filled up with drunken baseball fans.
used to describe a situation in which a lot of alcohol has been drunk: a drunken brawl He came home and fell into a drunken stupor (= sleep).
